title: RISC OS Upgrade CD (3.7 to 4.x)
description:
+----------------------------------------------------------------------+
        |                                                                      |
        |   Supplied......:  Acorn Antiques    Release name..:  UPGRADE.rar    |
        |   Packaged......:  filth             Release type..:  Util           |
        |   Protection....:  none              Language......:  English        |
        |   Crack/SN......:  n/a               Size..........:  16.8 MB        |
        |   Format........:  ISO inside RAR    OS............:  RISC OS        |
        |                                                                      |
        |   MD5 checksum.................: d52e35d6da2fc7d536feec4a71c5232e    |
        |                                                                      |
        |   ================================================================   |
        |                            Description                               |
        |   ================================================================   |
        |                                                                      |
        |   Breathe new life into your A5000 or RiscPC!                        |
        |                                                                      |
        |   This CD contains softload versions of RISC OS that can be          |
        |   used to soft-upgrade a RiscPC, A7000(+), Mico, Omega,              |
        |   RiscStation or VirtualRiscPC in either of the following            |
        |   ways:                                                              |
        |                                                                      |
        |   For RISC OS 3.6-3.71 machines, this CD will install a              |
        |   softload version of RISC OS 4.02.  You won't get access            |
        |   to long filenames or more than 77 files per directory,             |
        |   but you will get RISC OS 4.                                        |
        |                                                                      |
        |   For RISC OS 4.02 machines, this CD will install a softload         |
        |   verison of RISC OS 4.39 (Adjust).                                  |
        |                                                                      |
        |   You cannot (officially) upgrade RISC OS 3.5 or lower with          |
        |   this CD.                                                           |
        |                                                                      |
        +----------------------------------------------------------------------+
        |                                                                      |
        |   Visit our profile for more, including some vary rare releases!     |
        |                                                                      |
        |               <a href=" http://thepiratebay.se/user/antiques" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://thepiratebay.se/user/antiques</a>                 |
        |                                                                      |
        |  [tags: risc, risc os, acorn, acorn user, riscos, magazine, cover]   |
        |                                                                      |
        +----------------------------------------------------------------------+
        |                                                                      |
        |   Please seed - this is for the benefit of the RISC OS community,    |
        |   to ensure that these CDs and the files on them are never lost.     |
        |   Do your part to help, but please do support legitimate developers! |
        |                                                                      |
